suite.name: parallel-app.teragrid.org-4.0.0
suite.description: The Parallel Application Support Kit provides the capability that TeraGrid users can use for developing and running science applications that execute on multiple processors and/or nodes within a single resource or cluster and that communicate between those processors and/or nodes using a message passing library.
